summary: A follower overhaul compilation for six NPCs. Asides unique face textures, they have unique body textures as well. Elves are made with Ethereal Elven Overhaul. EVERYTHING INSIDE IS STANADLONE.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69461/?]AELA AND SERANA MOD HERE[/url][/center][/size]




[color=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]ABOUT[/SIZE][/font] [/color]

This mod customizes the appearances of six followers with unique customized face and body textures. All characters have Lightfoot perks so that they won't activate traps and housecarls have different classes(except for Jordis). [color=orange]NO MODS ARE REQUIRED[/color], EVERYTHING IS [color=orange]STANDALONE[/color].

[img=right] http://i.imgur.com/cecul.jpg[/img] [right][b][font=arialblack][size=9][color= #696969]Aranea[/color][/font][/size] [/b]
The Priestess

Body Type: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14232]Ryougi Shiki Eyes[/url]
Class: Elemental Mage
Perks Added: Lightfoot
[color=orange]Extra Credits to: [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul [/url] for meshes, normal maps, warpaints and tints. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Cover Women[/url] for eye brows. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24600]XCE Scarface[/url] for scar resources. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url] for small blemishes resources. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]Navetsea[/url] for diffuse face/body textures and body normal map.[/right]
[img=left] http://i.imgur.com/rJsS1.jpg[/img] [b][font=Arialblack][size=9][color= #696969]Brelyna[/color][/font][/size][/b]
The Magician

Body Type: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Eyes of Beauty[/url]
Class: Mystic
Perks Added: Lightfoot
[color=orange]Extra Credits to: [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul [/url]for meshes, normal maps, warpaints and tints. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]CoverWomen [/url]for eye brows. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url] for small blemishes resources. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]Navetsea[/url] for diffuse face/body textures and body normal map. Misjennabee for Improved Freckles Skyrim (not on Nexus anymore)
[IMG=right] http://i.imgur.com/16DNB.jpg[/IMG]
[right][b][font=arialblack][size=9][color= #696969]Jenassa[/color][/font][/size] [/b]
The Freelancer

Body Type: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Eyes of Beauty[/url]
Class: Ranger
Perks Added: Lightfoot, Bullseye, Stealth (Tier 1), Critical Shot (Tier 1)
[color=orange]Extra Credits to: [/color] Wast 1980 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24867]Body Paint Mod[/url]. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] for meshes, normal maps, warpaints and tints. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]CoverWomen[/url] for eye brows. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url] for small blemishes resources and scars. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]Navetsea[/url] for diffuse face/body textures and body normal map. [/right]
[img=left]http://i.imgur.com/R8lQX.jpg[/img]
[b][font=arialblack][size=9][color= #696969]Iona[/color][/font][/size] [/b]
The Wasp


Body Type: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249] Improved Eyes Skyrim[/url]
Class: Rogue (much like Mercer Frey)
Perks Added: Light Foot, Dual Flurry(Tier 1), Snakeblood, Stealth (Tier 3)
[color=orange]Extra Credits to: [/color] Regnbeggar for face warpaint. Svarog for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731] Fitness Body [/url] normal maps. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]CoverWomen[/url] for eye brows. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url] for small blemishes resources. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]Navetsea[/url] for diffuse textures. Zzjay for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483] Women of Skyrim Normal Maps[/url]. Misjennabee for Improved Freckles Skyrim (no longer on Nexus).
[img=right] http://i.imgur.com/mVQU0.jpg [/img] [right][b][font=arialblack][size=9][color= #696969]Jordis[/color][/font][/size] [/b]
The Commander

Body Type: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249] Improved Eyes Skyrim[/url]
Class: One-Handed Warrior (regular housecarl)
Perks Added: Light Foot, Savage Strike, Block Runner, Armsman (Tier 1)
[color=orange]Extra Credits to: [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3574]Gizmodians Scars[/url] for face scar. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377]Sporty Sexy Map[/url] for body normal maps. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]CoverWomen[/url] for eye brows. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url] for small blemishes resources. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]Navetsea[/url] for diffuse face/body textures. Zzjay for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483] Women of Skyrim Normal Maps[/url]. MissJennabee for Improved Freckles Skyrim (no longer on Nexus).[/right]
[img=left]http://i.imgur.com/X66T0.jpg[/img] [b][font=arialblack][size=9][color= #696969]Lydia[/color][/font][/size] [/b]
The Paladin

Body Type: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666] CBBE [/url]
Eyes: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249] Improved Eyes Skyrim[/url]
Class: Two-Handed Warrior
Perks Added: Light Foot, Juggernaut (Tier 2), Champion's Stance, Magic Resistance (Tier 1)
[color=orange]Extra Credits to: [/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3574]Gizmodians Scars[/url] for facial scar. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]CoverWomen[/url] for eye brows. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url] for small blemishes resources. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]Navetsea[/url] for diffuse face/body textures and body normal map. Zzjay for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483] Women of Skyrim Normal Maps[/url]. MissJennabee for Improved Freckles Skyrim (no longer on Nexus).

[color=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Installation[/SIZE][/font] [/color]
Use NMM or manually drop the folder in the Skyrim root folder.
[color=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Uninstallation[/SIZE][/font] [/color]
Use NMM or delete all of the files manually.

If uninstalling manually, first delete the [color=orange] Beanshousecarls.esp[/color] or [color=orange] BeansElves.esp[/color] from the Data Files load order.

Secondly remove the .TARGA, .dds, and the .NIF files with the codes all found in the [size=3] READ MES [/size] located at
[color=#C0C0C0]skyrim/Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Skyrim.esm and
skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/Skyrim.esm[/color]

LASTLY, delete the two Beans folders located in [color=#C0C0C0]skyrim/Data/textures[/color] and at [color=#C0C0C0]skyrim/Data/meshes[/color]

[color=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Compatibility[/SIZE][/font] [/color]
This mods should work with most NPC affecting mods, and most definitely NPC makeover mods. If you want to use an appearance of a certain NPC over mine, place its .esp below mine to make it work.

[color=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Troubleshooting[/SIZE][/font] [/color]
[b] Crash to Desktop on Loading Saves with my NPCs[/b]
1- go to the main men of the game and open up the console with the tilde key (`).
2-Type in [color=orange]coc qasmoke[/color] to be loaded into a new cell. Hit ESC to load up your recent save and the NPCs should work

[b] Monsters in Proudspire Manor for housecarls.esp[/b]
Download beanshousecarl.esp Version 1.1 or use the individual files for Jordis, Iona and Lydia where the problem has been fixed.

[b] CBBE users who get CTD when Brelyna has no clothes [/b]
Replace the UNP meshes by downloading the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Main Base Body 1.2[/url] and extracting the [color=orange]femalebody_0.nif, femalebody_1.nif, femalehands_0.nif, femalehands_1.nif, femalefeet_0.nif and the femalefeet_1.nif[/color] to

For 34-bit users [color=orange] Computer/ OS (C: )/ Program Files/Steam/Steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/meshes/Beans/UNP/[/color]
For 64-bit user [color=orange]Computer/ OS (C: )/ Program Files(x86)/Steam/Steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/meshes/Beans/UNP[/color].
This replaces Brelyna's meshes with the same thing, but it strangely enough works.

[b] Gray-Face bugs[/b]
Make sure that my .esp is below anything that affects NPCs. This includes mods that affects NPC faces, follower customizations, and perks. This is [color=orange]especially important[/color] for mods like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url].

[color=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Credits[/SIZE][/font] [/color]
Thank you Navetsea, MissJennabee, Wast1980, Lograam, Xenius, Gizmodian Caliente, Dimon, regnbeggar MrLenski, Nuska, Reverseside, betterbecause, Svarog, x2sreality for the appearance mods that made this mod possible! Also thank you LSiwora for making a really damn good [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123]ENB[/url].

Thank you for Kamikazekossori, MissMorose, GraceScreech, Bryan244, toro66ro and e39042 for being my guinea pig beta testers.

Thank you zzjay, DreamKingMods, hfiani, Arron Dominion, nuska, and 83willow for advice.

Thank you mayatola, natilde and baskimm for creating standalone follower mods, which I dissected through thoroughly to learn how to make some myself.

And thank you to everyone who has supported me throughout my six-months of modding. =)

[center]
